alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued October 16 at 8:29PM PDT until October 19 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 PM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...High temperatures 95 to 99 degrees expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. * WHEN...From 10 AM Wednesday to 8 PM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Heat illnesses may occur.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
